授業目的:
This course aims to:
1. Develop understanding of various HRM functional capabilities required to plan,
select, develop, and motivate workers.
2. Develop an understanding of the impact of changing social, economic, technological and organizational environment on HR processes and practices
3. Prepare students to evaluate and apply certain theories of social science disciplines to workplace issues
4. Develop students’ ability to analyze and critically evaluate HR policies and practices
到達目標:
On completion of this course students should be able to:
1. Effectively manage and plan key human resource functions within organizations
2. Examine current issues, trends, practices, and processes in HRM
3. Be able to face upto human resource challenges
授業方法:
enhance skills and beautify attitude towards the HR profession. Instructor will deliver lectures face to face and Students have to attend the class and submit case study assignments. Evaluation will be made on the basis of class participation and assignments submission. Considering the corona virus situation, I will consider the requests of students who would like to have hybrid classes.
"Students need to pre-apply for the course during 4/1～4/3 on Kyogaku web”.
